Class InstructorPromote

java.lang.Object
application.InstructorPromote
public class InstructorPromote extends Object
InstructorPromote class represents a pop-up window that allows instructors to promote or demote students by adding or removing the reviewer role. This class handles the UI components and database operations for managing student reviewer roles within the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructorPromote

      public InstructorPromote(DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User currentUser)
      Constructor for InstructorPromote.
      Parameters:
      databaseHelper - Helper class for database operations
      currentUser - The currently logged in instructor user

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Shows the promotion/demotion popup window. Creates and displays a modal dialog with UI components for selecting students and managing their reviewer roles.

    • loadStudents

      private void loadStudents()
      Loads all students into the student selector combobox. Only includes users who have the "student" role but not "instructor" or "admin" roles. This method filters the complete user list to display only eligible students.

    • updateStatusLabel

      private void updateStatusLabel()
      Updates the status label based on the selected student. Retrieves the selected student's information and checks if they have the reviewer role, then updates the status label accordingly.

    • promoteStudent

      private void promoteStudent()
      Promotes the selected student by adding the reviewer role. Validates the selection, checks if the student already has the reviewer role, and performs the database operation to add the role if needed. Shows appropriate alerts for success, failure, or validation issues.

    • demoteStudent

      private void demoteStudent()
      Demotes the selected student by removing the reviewer role. Validates the selection, checks if the student currently has the reviewer role, and performs the database operation to remove the role if needed. Shows appropriate alerts for success, failure, or validation issues.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String message)
      Shows an alert dialog with the specified type, title, and message. Creates and displays a JavaFX Alert dialog to inform the user about operations results or required actions.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert to show (e.g., information, warning, error)
      title - The title of the alert
      message - The message to display in the alert
